name: Konak Hotel

reviews.text: Stayed at konak aug 2011. Made many new friends and were looked after so well by the konak boys. Already planning our stay for next year wouldnt go anywhere else.
reviews.title: We'll definately be back

reviews.text: Chunky,Georgie,Jodie and Liam
reviews.title: Clean Hotel but Integrity is suspect !! Be careful !!

reviews.text: Hotel is reasonably clean and the food is average.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel will definatley be staying again

reviews.text: We left our small digital camera by mistake in the hotel and returned in less than ten mins to collect. Unfortunately, we made the mistake of calling the hotel and telling them where we left it !! Our guide too thought the hotel staff might be involved !! So, be very careful with your belongings not only in the city but also the hotels !!
reviews.title: Comfortable Hotel; no complaints

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staying at the konak was sort of a last minute decision as we left it too late to be reading reviews about other hotels so we were advised by friends to stay here so we did. Upon arrival we were greeted by smiling staff all willing to take our cases and make us feel welcome. The apartments were clean and spacious with no problems whatsoever. The maid came in everyday to change our bedsheets and lay fresh towels and was very nice to us despite her only knowing the basics of english language. The staff were just lovely and very helpfull and friendly i could not ask for such nicer people to name a few theres Saffet,Emre,Rambo,EnesAkin and more who i didnt catch the name off. Everyday they were cheerful and happy and always pushing me and my friend in the pool which was funny. If it was someones birthday or any other celebration the whole aprtments would know about it making a big fuss with cake,loud music and dancing and happy faces everywhere. The pool was clean and very quiet in the day time a great place to relax really. At the night they sometimes had pool parties where everyone would get in the pool and have a great laugh which we enjoyed so much. Overall our stay at the Konak was very enjoyable and relaxing we will definatley be going back :D
reviews.title: Stick with it!

reviews.text: all i can say s that this hotel is the bis and i would go back there again the lads are spot on and the food was tops..the rooms are large and all have a balcony. there is no lift but its not a problem as the lads will help with the bags. i stayed there for 4 days and loved it also the breakfast was spot on and only £2, i would recommend this hotel if you are on a limited budget as you will not be disappointed...TOP PLACE.........
reviews.title: loved it

reviews.text: I like your friendly Staff and excellent service for my team last June 19-24 and June 26-30'11. You are all like a family to all of us. We appreciate your staff kind assistance in the lobby, reception and room service. I commend your Hotel. GOD bless you more guest. Hope to visit you again this November. :)
reviews.title: We like your service & love all your excellent staff...we'll be back!=)

reviews.text: Ideally located hotel within a short walking distance of Taksim square. Friendly staff with good sized rooms. Excellent value for money with a friendly and efficient front desk. I have stayed in hotels all over the world and if you are looking for a decent budget hotel, this one fits the bill. I also got free WIFI access during my stay with above average connectivity and free breakfast thrown in too.
reviews.title: Excellent Value For Money

reviews.text: the most lovely people work at Konak. Im so happy that we can book now at Konak. We have been to marmaris for 6 years now, and every year we eat at Konak almost the 14 days we are there. Its the best place to eat and have fun.And the nicest staff. S you take your family and freinds and book your holiday at Konak. You wont regret <3
reviews.title: best place in tyrkie

reviews.text: I was grateful for the accommodating staff who allowed my colleagues and I to check in way before the designated check in time. The staff were friendly. Food was good. Rooms were cosy and clean. My only grouse is that the hotel was rather noisy at night because of its proximity to the main road. Perhaps the management could sound-proof the rooms?
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here on the recommendation of a friend. Our tour guide got the hotels mixed up, and we stayed here. We normally stay more upmarket.
reviews.title: A good base for touring Istanbul

reviews.text: Check in was efficient, the room was spacious. However we were on room 712 on the top floor. There was some industrial noise that stopped and started all night. This was nnoying.
reviews.title: Very good experience!

reviews.text: The breakfast was a buffet, there was a good selection.
reviews.title: Cost effective boutique hotel well worth a stay

reviews.text: The shower and bathrooms were clean and comfortable.
reviews.title: Just enough

reviews.text: We walked up the street for dinner, and found plenty of good restaurants within a 5-10 minute walk.
reviews.title: Very Nice and Comfortable Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of the hotel is away from Taksim busy area, however the area is quiet and it is 5 minutes walking to Taksim square, the hotel is facing Taksim Hilton hotel. Konak is a very clean and quiet hotel, the breakfast is amazing specially pastries which were unbelievably tasty. Staffs were helpful and are good in English. The size of the room was good, elegant and very clean and well furnished, toilet and shower are in good shape. I recommend this hotel for business traveler as well as for couples.
reviews.title: Clean hotel in a convenient location

reviews.text: Room Tip: I got my room on the 7th floor, the view was not attracting, but room was spacy, cosy and very clean
reviews.title: Convenient clean hotel in Taksim

reviews.text: The location of the hotel is away from Taksim busy area, however the area is quiet and it is 5 minutes walking to Taksim square, the hotel is facing Taksim Hilton hotel. Konak is a very clean and quiet hotel, the breakfast is amazing specially pastries which were unbelievably tasty. Staffs were helpful and are good in English. The size of the room was good, elegant and very clean and well furnished, toilet and shower are in good shape. I recommend this hotel for business traveler as well as for couples.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

reviews.text: Very nice and helpful staff, good location, but noisy.
reviews.title: Great Holiday!!

reviews.text: We stayed here end of August 2011. It was our second time in Marmaris that summer. We read reviews before coming here and had high hopes... we wasn't disappointed!! The staff are very friendly and a good laugh. We ate there a few times and the food was great. The chef Ismail is a great guy as are all the boys. We wasn't pressured to eat or drink there either like most places. The rooms were very clean and spacious and the cleaner is a lovely lady. We didn't use the pool as we have friends who work at a hotel down the road, but it was never busy and always spare sunloungers. I would definately stay here again. The boys are great. :)
reviews.title: Konak Istanbul - tucked away but still close to Taksim and good value

description: Konak Hotel is located in the heart of the Taksim Square, which is close to the Lutfi Kirdar Exhibition Center, ICEC and Military Museum. Shopping, night life, restaurants, bars, clubs, museums and historical places are all walking distance.
